objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has queried the Registry on compromised systems for information on installed software.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)(Citation: CISA AA24-038A PRC Critical Infrastructure February 2024)
